Title: Tip 319 - How to create custom handlers for Azure Functions
Description: Azure Functions (opens new window) are great for running serverless pieces of code. Functions also provide triggers and bindings (opens new window), which make it easy to start a function, receive data and do something with that data, without writing plumbing code. You could already create Azure Functions in many languages, and now with Custom Handlers (opens new window), you can have a Function trigger any type of code.
